p:
Casearia sylvestris essential oil was obtained by hydrodistillation of its leaves (150 g) for 4 h in a Clevenger-type apparatus according to the procedure described in the European Pharmacopoeia
21 . M. divaricatum essential oil was obtained by Moreira et al.
16 . The EOs were stored in amber bottles and kept in the refrigerator at 4 Â°C until further analysis. The yields (w/w) were calculated from the weight of the fresh aerial parts and leaves of M. divaricatum (0.4%) and leaves of C. sylvestris (0.3%). E-Caryophyllene was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA).
